instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3330 - GPU is dying?
threads.message:
Heaven benchmark will crash after a couple of minutes and sometime when I run normal apps will crash. I've already tried reflow and using new solder on U8900.
I've tried new RAM as well and using my own external osx drive.

Passed ASD OS.
Heaven doesn't crash when using Intel HD Graphic only.

threads.title: 820-3330 - GPU is dying?
threads.message: Could be GPU or VRAM too. This one will be no fun

threads.title: 820-3330 - GPU is dying?
threads.message:
If no result after GMUX reflow, then bad GPU.
Try and pray...
